scripts.build-autolayout: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cd dist && cmake .. -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=$EMSCRIPTEN_CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE -DBOOST_ROOT=$BOOST_ROOT && make -j 6
scripts.test: rm -rf cmake-build-test && mkdir cmake-build-test && cd cmake-build-test && cmake -DBOOST_ROOT=$BOOST_ROOT .. && make && ./autolayout
